page.title: 09SHOP TRADE IN AYLESBURY
page.content: We visited a Tesco's {hypermarket} in Aylesbury. It had a petrol station, which helped its business, and a cafe. The goods were brought by lorries from {Tesco} depots or other firms. Tesco's has 33 tills so that people don't have to queue for a long time. The store we visited baked all of its own cakes and crusty bread on the premises. The bakers have to start work at midnight to prepare bread for the next day. We then visited a {small shop}. It sold mostly meat and tinned goods but also dairy products. His goods were supplied from Denmark and Holland. He told us that Tesco's had not yet affected his {trade} because it draws people into the town.
